pullrequest.title: Preserve previous GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH values when sourcing setup.sh

content.raw:
Any chance of preserving also `GAZEBO_PLUGIN_PATH` previous values ?

In the past we have experienced some bugs when using roslaunch with gazebo-yarp-plugins (see https://github.com/robotology/gazebo-yarp-plugins/issues/123 ). I have never investigated them appropriately because I don't have a ROS setup,  but I guess preserving   `GAZEBO_PLUGIN_PATH` previous values should solve this kind of problems.
content.html:
Any chance of preserving also GAZEBO_PLUGIN_PATH previous values ?

In the past we have experienced some bugs when using roslaunch with gazebo-yarp-plugins (see https://github.com/robotology/gazebo-yarp-plugins/issues/123 ). I have never investigated them appropriately because I don't have a ROS setup, but I guess preserving GAZEBO_PLUGIN_PATH previous values should solve this kind of problems.
